directions.step:
Preheat oven to 425 F. Scoop out the squash seeds and fibers and discard. Place squash in greased baking dish. Put 1 teaspoon each of sherry, brown sugar, and butter in each squash half. Cover and bake for 30 minutes or until tender. Scoop squash out of shells, leaving wall about 1/4 inch thick. Mash squash and combine with remaining 4 tablespoons butter, pineapple, nutmeg and salt, beating well to blend. Spoon back into shells and return to oven to bake for 15 minutes more.
